work.name: British Petroleum (BP)
work.summary:
By simplifying end-to-end fleet management and offering guidance on how to decarbonize their fleet, a one-stop digital platform operating on BP's Superfleet platform assists fleet managers who want to maximize the efficiency of their fleet. This frees up time to expand their business in a Net Zero world. ​

- I contributed to the Notification Team (Squad), ensuring that Superfleet users may improve their 
   platform experiences by not missing any action or insight made on the platform.
- I was a part of the Audit Trail Team, whose job it was to keep a log of all the platform's users' past 
   actions.
- Involvement in Domains Team, managing high-level monorepo architecture for efficient team 
   development and CI/CD pipelines

NX | React.js | Typescript | Webpack | Node.js | Azure Devops
